data.title: 15 Miles Of Dazzling Christmas Lights Transforms Ohio's Carillon Historical Park During The Holidays
data.meta_description: Carillon Park at Christmas in Dayton, Ohio, features a winter wonderland of dazzling Christmas lights and festive fun for the entire family.
data.text:
Do you have a holiday bucket list? Does it include epic Christmas lights displays in Ohio? If so, there’s a one-of-a-kind park in Dayton that goes all out for the holiday season that you need to know about — and it belongs at the top of your list. Carillon Historical Park in Dayton features a winter wonderland of lights, train rides, slides and other attractions during A Carillon Christmas. With more than 15 miles of dazzling lights, Christmas themed activities and caroling, it’s one of the best places in Ohio to spend the holiday season. Here’s why you’ll want to visit Carillon Park at Christmas:

Advertisement

Advertisement

Have you ever been to Carillon Park at Christmas? If so, what was your favorite part of the historical park? Tell us about your experience in the comments below. And to learn more about this historical park in Ohio, be sure to visit the Carillon Park website. Also, follow the park on Facebook for updates regarding the upcoming Christmas festivities.

For more Christmas lights and holiday fun in Ohio, check out our previous article: The 12 Best Christmas Light Displays In Ohio.

More to Explore

Christmas lights in Ohio

What's the best place to go to see Christmas lights in Ohio?

The holidays are a magical time in Ohio. All throughout the Buckeye State, there are captivating Christmas light displays that will make you feel as if you’re in a real-life winter wonderland. While all are incredible, a few superlative standouts are the Legendary Lights of Clifton Mill (an award-winning display), the PNC Festival of Lights at the Cincinnati Zoo (another nationally acclaimed event), and Wildlights at the Columbus Zoo and Aquarium. But really, they’re all incredible and guaranteed to get you in the spirit for the season! Here are some of what we consider to be the must-visit spots to view Christmas lights in Ohio -- which is your favorite?

What's Christmas in Ohio like?

While the Buckeye State is always dreaming of a white Christmas, the reality is, our Christmases are generally pretty quiet. This isn't a bad thing; we can usually enjoy holiday hikes and lights excursions without enduring weather that's too frigid or unbearable. Of course, sometimes it does snow on Christmas, which is the icing on the cake. With so many fun holiday events and activities in Ohio, Christmastime is a marvelous part of the year that we all very much enjoy and look forward to!

What's the most unique place to see Christmas lights in Ohio?

You've probably heard of "Christmas towns," but here in Ohio, we have a Christmas ranch! The Christmas Ranch in Morrow, Ohio, features one of the most enchanting light displays you’ll ever see. It’s a walk-through village unlike any other holiday attraction in the state. This magical (and massive!) Christmas Village in Ohio is a world unto itself, complete with a million LED lights, impressive decorations and displays, a Santa-themed cafe, Christmas train, holiday shops, and even the Man in Red himself! Have you been to this incredible Christmas village in Ohio.
